text:
You solved it.

The missing are accounted for. The pattern is broken. The case is closed.

You won.

But when you look in the mirror, you don't recognize the eyes staring back.

How many lies did you tell? How many people did you sacrifice?

How much of yourself did you leave behind in Tyger Tyger?

"Necessary sacrifices," you tell yourself.

The ends justified the means.

Didn't they?

You pack your bags. You leave town.

But the blood on your hands doesn't wash off.

It never does.
